name: vertex-shader-fs
script: precision highp float;    varying vec2 vTextureCoord;  varying vec3 vLightWeighting;    uniform vec4 uColor;  uniform bool uUseTextures;  uniform sampler2D uSampler;    void main(void) {   if(uUseTextures) {    vec4 textureColor = texture2D(uSampler, vec2(vTextureCoord.s, vTextureCoord.t));    gl_FragColor = vec4(textureColor.rgb * uColor.rgb * vLightWeighting, textureColor.a); /* TODO: think about how to use, uColor alpha and if we should */   }   else {    gl_FragColor = vec4(uColor.rgb * vLightWeighting, uColor.a);   }  }
